subject: asset(icons): redesign icon as flat illustration avatar with square glasses
body:
Recreated the SVG icon from scratch to match a flat design avatar style
with square glasses, full beard, shoulders/shirt, and the project's blue
color palette. Regenerated all PNG sizes and favicon.
